scripts.build.dev: npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test && npx webpack --config webpack.dev.js && npx rimraf dist/src
scripts.build.release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test.coverage && rimraf dist/src && npx webpack --config webpack.prod.js && npx rimraf dist/src && npm run integration-test
scripts.cut.release: npm run build.release && npx standard-version && npm run build.release && npm run pushAndRelease
scripts.pushAndRelease: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.build.all: npm run build.release && npm run docs
scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist && npx rimraf coverage
scripts.test: npx mocha --recursive -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/**/*.spec.ts src/**/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-debug: npx mocha --inspect-brk --recursive -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/**/**/*.spec.ts src/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test.coverage: npm run clean && npx nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary mocha --recursive -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/**/*.spec.ts src/**/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.graph.deps: npx depcruise --validate --exclude "(spec|^node_modules)" .dependency-cruiser.js --include-only '^src' --output-type dot src | dot -T jpg > dist/dependencygraph.jpg
